descriptions.title: HI THERE!
descriptions.name: Karmugil Kalaiyarasan Kavitha
descriptions.description: A full stack developer having knowledge on cutting edge front-end and back-end technologies and laguages. Along with that I am also very familiar with SQL and NoSQL queries and development which involves designing of those databases. I have 2 years of experience in Software Testing and Full-stack development. Please look into my portfolio to know more about me.

education.title: Bachelor's in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
education.description: I have done my Bachelor's degree on Electrical and Electroninc Engineering. While taking this program I came across software development courses like c++, Java and Database management. That is when I found my love towards technology and started exploring more which helped me find out my Work and Post-Graduation on Software Field.

education.title: Post-Graduation Certification in Database Application Developer
education.description: Once I gained knowledge on software developing and worked on software industry for more than 2 years, I thought it would be a good time to dig deep on technologies like Databases along with developing applications with responsive web pages that uses the data from Databases. Fortunately I found this course which helped me learn about SQL and NoSQL database development and designing along with I have also gained knowledge regarding server development technologies like NodeJS, ExpressJS, Springboot. Also, I learned ReactJS for the front end development of web pages.

education.title: Post-Graduation Certification in Web Development
education.description: Although I have learned all these technologies my front-end skills like HTML,CSS and Venilla Javascript was not that strong. So I decided to take a web developemnt program in Humber where I learned these three technologies intensively.
